description:
Garett had been away for a while taking care of some business. After his last film, he was very excited about fucking some hot ass. But, as we all know, life sometimes gets in the way.
I guess he finally got everything taken care of, because he called me wanting to know if I was ready to have him do another film. I think Garett is hot as hell, so I told him, "Sure, I'll see what I can do."
Cameron is a cutie who had e-mailed me about wanting to get fucked by Garett. I had seen a few photos of Cameron (hot!) and I thought they would look good together, so after speaking with him on the phone I took a chance and bought him a plane ticket.
When I finally got them together, the sparks were immediate. Garett was hard right out of his pants and stayed rock hard the whole time... and Cameron really loved getting his ass pounded. I noticed while we were filming that his eyes were rolled back up into his head most of the time!
title: Garett & Cameron
